Literature.Title: Two plant puroindolines colocalize in wheat seed and in vitro synergistically fight against pathogens
Literature.Author: Capparelli R, Amoroso MG, Palumbo D, Iannaccone M, Faleri C, Cresti M

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli(MIC=30±0.316µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=30±0.258µg/ml),Agrobacterium tumefaciens(MIC=35±0.632µg/ml),Pectobacterium carotovorum subsp. carotovorum(MIC=50±0.418µg/ml),Pectobacterium carotovorum subsp. carotovorum(MIC=50±0.376µg/ml),Clavibacter michiganensis subsp. michiganensis(MIC=50±0.774µg/ml)
